content.p: CIDA is a research centre in the University of Nottingham Malaysia initiated and driven by the Faculty of Arts and Social Science (FASS). The centre prioritizes its research initiatives in one or more of the established University research priority areas. Specifically, these research initiatives revolve around, but are not restricted to, the key subject area as follows: CIDA aims to address the rapid growth in demand for data analytics, statistical modelling and simulation to impart novel research initiatives for the university, research entities in science, engineering, and information technology. CIDA is represented by members from all three faculties, and has two of the biggest technology partners in the area of analytics, Microsoft and SAS, which are facilitating the technical infrastructure and analytics platform. This centre strives to be the leading research centre in interdisciplinary sciences, data analytics and statistical simulation by: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8034 email: rke.hub@nottingham.edu.my
